anpl:
def main(input_grid: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    rows_index = "find the rows that contain grid other than black and output the number list"(input_grid)
    mod_rows_index = rows_index[:-1]
    output_grid = "deep copy of input_grid"(input_grid)
    output_grid[mod_rows_index, 1:] = input_grid[mod_rows_index, :-1]
    output_grid = "for each grid of rightmost column of the input_gird, if the color is not black, change the color of the grid with the same location in the output_grid to this color"(input_grid, output_grid)
    return output_grid
